TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ValidationError extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示所有驗證錯誤的基底類別。

span.span: Represents the base class for all validation errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何在自訂驗證常式中建立及管理驗證錯誤。The following example shows how to create and manipulate validation errors as part of a custom validation routine. 這個程式碼範例是 SendEMailActivity.cs 檔案中＜傳送郵件 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Send Mail SDK Sample and is from the SendEMailActivity.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[傳送郵件活動](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669)。For more information, see [Send Mail Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#235](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#235)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#235](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#235)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列範例將示範如何在自訂驗證常式中建立及管理驗證錯誤。The following example shows how to create and manipulate validation errors as part of a custom validation routine. 這個程式碼範例是 SendEMailActivity.cs 檔案中＜傳送郵件 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Send Mail SDK Sample and is from the SendEMailActivity.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[傳送郵件活動](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669)。For more information, see [Send Mail Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669). remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具會使用這個屬性顯示組態錯誤，並將使用者巡覽至包含錯誤的屬性。This property is used by the designer to display configuration errors and navigate the user to the properties that contain the errors.
